text: A pow-wow is a ceremony practiced by the Pennsylvania Dutch. It is used to cure animals of sickness. It is mainly made up of Christian folk religion and early European beliefs. ==Other websites== *http://braucher.webs.com/ *http://www.esoteric.msu.edu/VolumeIV/Powwow.htm *http://www.sacred- texts.com/ame/pow/index.htm Category:Magic (paranormal)
title: Pow-wow (folk magic)
